description.value: Your hydraulic legs give you great jumping ability. When performing a @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Long Jump]{Long Jump}, you can travel up to 4 feet further. When performing a @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.High Jump]{High Jump}, you can jump two feet higher and, on a critical success, you can jump five additional feet higher. When you fail, it is always considered as if you landed on a soft substance. If you are an expert in Acrobatics, double these numbers. If you are legendary, treat critical failures to jump as failures instead.
